about_the_game:
• Sail the oceans of Miloria and meet various characters across diverse climates.
  • Make political decisions on how to run your ship, balance your crew morale and profits.
  • Manage a seabound brothel to generate extra income. You can choose, dress and train the courtesans.



  • Unique dungeon system, where stat checks and player choices determine your success.
  • Card-based combat. Build a deck and improve it throughout the game by discovering new actions.
  • Collect Rarity-tiered equipment to improve your characters abilities during scenes and combat.



  • Dating system, complete with relationship drama and regretful decisions!
  • Experience (fully optional) animated sexual content, with alternate versions and branching content.
  • (There are 25+ animated sexual CGs currently in the game)
  • Horny gals, beefy guys, insatiable demons, twinks, monster-girls, intersex, traps, and loads more kinky content types.
  • Optional Censors so that you may enjoy the adventure without any 'nipple slips'.



  • Dynamic NPC generation using a powerful character creator system.
  • Create your own character, and transform their appearance throughout the game.
  • Hire and manage randomized fighters and brothel workers. Level up and improve them.



  • Extensive modding capabilities. Share your own scenes, characters and kinks!
  • Beautiful soundtrack and stunning artwork by various popular internet artists.
  • An expanding development, with an open dialogue to the community.



Venture Seas is currently a solo development (VentureSwitch) with occasional artwork commissions to ease the workload.

Venture Seas is a fictional story based in a fantasy world, where the politics, theology or prejudices of real-life do not apply.


As a means to create an engaging story, characters may express opinions or actions that could be considered offensive or distasteful.

If you are skilled and interested in paid work to help speed up the development, please don't hesitate to get in touch!

If interested, please add Venture Seas to your Steam Wishlist!
